subject: order
description_text:
Hello,

Could you please tell me what the statu sis.

Jean-Pierre et Michèle DOR

conversations.body_text: Hi Dor. jean-pierre,  Could you please provide your order number? We will check it.
Hi Dor. jean-pierre,    The 2-in-1 shifter will start shipping from today. There has been a slight adjustment to the delivery schedule due to changes in some components.
